description: Acoustic signal classification involves identifying and categorizing sounds based on their characteristics. This is particularly useful in applications such as wildlife monitoring, agricultural practices, and emotional analysis of animal vocalizations.
you_have_this_if: You are working with audio data from animals or environments.
